H0.text: Famously depicting the Norman Conquest of England, the Bayeux Tapestry is actually. Woven Wall Hanging

H1.text: Famously depicting the Norman Conquest of England, the Bayeux Tapestry is actually. Medieval Painting

H2.text: Famously depicting the Norman Conquest of England, the Bayeux Tapestry is actually. Illuminated Manuscript

H3.text: Famously depicting the Norman Conquest of England, the Bayeux Tapestry is actually. Embroidered Cloth

A4.text: The Bayeux Tapestry is an embroidered cloth nearly 70 metres (230 feet) long and 50 centimetres (20 inches) tall

A5.text: It is technically an embroidery, although it meets the traditional broader definition of 'tapestry'
